{{Description|The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat. It is said that this plant slowly develops intelligence and unique behaviors as it accumulates elemental energy.}}

'''Flaming Flower Stamens''' are commonly found near grassy areas as [[Flaming Flower]]s. Using a [[Hydro]] or [[Cryo]] skill on Flaming Flowers will extinguish them to become harvestable. However, [[Weather|rain]] alone will not work.

==Trivia==
* There are two Flaming Flower Stamens heating the hilichurl cooking pot of the Meaty Tribe in [[Dadaupa Gorge]]. The flowers can be extinguished, though there is no effect on the pot.
